summary: Quantumoney.app website with profile page synced to QuantumoneyAR.app game data
architectural_notes: Profile page integrates with game canisters: ippxc-5iaaa-aaaae-qgwqq-cai (main profile), x5shd-hqaaa-aaaap-qrdgq-cai (DAO), i7nyb-2yaaa-aaaaj-qowiq-cai (bridge), lkawl-3qaaa-aaaac-qdsoq-cai (additional)
Profile displays synced game data: XP points, locked/unlocked coins, captured monsters
Visual design: dynamic background, transparent windows, thin yellow borders, yellow text
Isolated patch - no modifications to other pages or footer
Website canisters: crjop-jyaaa-aaaah-atfaq-cai (frontend), whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai (docs), ckmsk-taaaa-aaaah-atfca-cai (QMY logic), nemlr-6aaaa-aaaan-q32la-cai (governance)

existing_features.title: Create a new Profile page route at /profile on Quantumoney.app that displays player data synchronized from QuantumoneyAR.app game canisters (ippxc-5iaaa-aaaae-qgwqq-cai, x5shd-hqaaa-aaaap-qrdgq-cai, i7nyb-2yaaa-aaaaj-qowiq-cai, lkawl-3qaaa-aaaac-qdsoq-cai)
Display player XP (experience points) from the AR game canisters in the profile view with real-time synchronization
Display player coins/currency balance from the AR game canisters in the profile view with real-time synchronization
Display captured monsters collection from the AR game canisters showing all monsters the player has caught
Apply dynamic background styling to the profile page with transparent window panels, yellow borders on all containers, and yellow text for headings and key information
Ensure the footer remains unmodified and does not include any Caffeine credits or references

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Profile page on Quantumoney.app with full sync to QuantumoneyAR.app game data
